image.alt: Steel City Orthodontics team and family smiling outside the office

paragraphs.text: QUALITY CARE WITH A PERSONAL TOUCH  START SMILING TODAY WITH STEEL CITY ORTHODONTICS. We offer personalized orthodontic care for children, teens, and adults across multiple convenient locations. Our team focuses on modern treatment options, including Invisalign<sup>®</sup>, braces, and surgical orthodontics, delivered with a warm, family-first approach.

Schedule a complimentary consultation to explore your options. We make treatment easy with friendly staff, flexible scheduling, and offices throughout the region so you can get the care you need close to home.

items.title: Award‑winning Team
items.text: Meet experienced, credentialed orthodontists who deliver individualized care and modern treatment planning.

items.title: Multiple Locations
items.text: South Park, McMurray, Washington, Charleroi, Montour Run, and Weirton — convenient offices to serve your family.

items.title: Modern Treatments
items.text: We offer Invisalign<sup>®</sup> (including Invisalign Teen), traditional braces, and surgical orthodontics when indicated.

items.title: Complimentary Consults
items.text: Family-friendly care with complimentary consultations for many patients and same-day scheduling options.

paragraphs.text: Dr. Maria Tassopoulou is a trusted member of the Steel City Orthodontics team. Patients appreciate her compassionate chairside manner and her focus on delivering care that builds confidence for children, teens, and adults. Learn more about her experience and clinical interests on our Meet Our Orthodontists page.

image.alt: Dr. Maria Tassopoulou, orthodontist at Steel City Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: Dr. John Fishell leads our Weirton office at 485 Colliers Way Ste E, Weirton, WV 26062. For appointments at that location please call (304) 723-3276. Visit his full bio and clinical background on our Meet Our Orthodontists page.

image.alt: Dr. John Fishell, orthodontist at Steel City Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: From traditional braces to Invisalign<sup>®</sup> clear aligners and surgical orthodontics, we offer options tailored to each patient's needs.

image.alt: Traditional braces on smiling patient
Invisalign aligner held by smiling patient
Invisalign Teen aligners for adolescents
Orthodontic surgical procedure illustration

testimonials.author: Julie P.
testimonials.testimonial: “Amazing staff and customer service! My daughter had a minor emergency with her braces over the weekend and Dr. Marcey and Dr. Maria were so helpful and caring and more than happy to help us out on a Sunday night! Highly recommend!”

testimonials.author: Leslie O.
testimonials.testimonial: “Bayli is almost done with her braces and says she will be sad to see them go. The staff creates a warm and friendly environment that she never minds going to. We chose them because once upon a time…MANY years ago, it is the same place that did my orthodontic work.”

testimonials.author: Dawn M.
testimonials.testimonial: “They are all wonderful!! Katie at the front desk is fantastic and always full of smiles and just wonderful. All the staff is so wonderful with my kiddos they just make them feel so comfortable. Both doctors are amazing, very good at their job – also very good with the kids. I am so glad we picked this orthodontist.”

About.title: QUALITY CARE WITH A PERSONAL TOUCH

paragraphs.text: Steel City Orthodontics offers personalized treatment for every age and every stage — children, teens, and adults — with options ranging from traditional braces to Invisalign<sup>®</sup> and surgical orthodontics when needed.
We recommend an orthodontic evaluation by age 7 to help guide permanent teeth into healthy positions and set the stage for a confident, well-aligned smile.
Our team combines modern technology, gentle techniques, and flexible scheduling to make orthodontic care comfortable, convenient, and easy to fit into your life.
We build lasting relationships with patients and families, so everyone feels supported through every phase of treatment and ready to share their new smile.

slides.alt: Montour Run exterior at Steel City Orthodontics
Steel City Orthodontics branding header image
New patient information graphic for Steel City Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: We love being part of the communities we serve. Follow our Instagram and Facebook feeds for patient appreciation posts, community events, and behind-the-scenes clinic highlights. We celebrate local schools, family moments, and milestones with posts that bring smiles to our neighbors (look for #steelcitypa and #smileat7).

image.alt: Social post showing patient appreciation and community engagement
New patient information at Steel City Orthodontics

seo.page_description: Learn about Steel City Orthodontics' patient-first approach, treatment options for all ages, and how to request a complimentary consultation.
seo.page_keywords: Steel City Orthodontics, Orthodontist, Braces, Invisalign, Pittsburgh orthodontics, consultation

og_meta.title: About Us | Steel City Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Learn about Steel City Orthodontics' patient-first approach, treatment options for all ages, and how to request a complimentary consultation.

image.alt: Smiling family welcomed at Lakeshore Orthodontics front desk

paragraphs.text: Your first visit begins with a friendly consultation where we get to know you and your smile goals. You will meet our team, have a thorough exam, and we will take any needed X-rays to understand your orthodontic needs.

After the exam we explain your treatment options, timing, and projected costs. Our goal is to make the plan clear and to answer every question so you can choose the right path for your child or yourself.

image.alt: Father with daughter at reception of dentist's surgery

paragraphs.text: We accept most major insurance plans and will file claims electronically to make billing simple for you.
Flexible payment plans are available, and our treatment coordinator will work with you to find an option that fits your budget.
To speed your first visit, please complete your new patient information when you request your consultation. You can begin the process online or bring completed forms to your appointment.

image.alt: Patient filling out orthodontic health history forms online
New patient information at Steel City Orthodontics

seo.page_description: Start your new patient journey with Steel City Orthodontics. Request a complimentary consultation, find forms, and learn what to expect at your first visit.
seo.page_keywords: Steel City Orthodontics, new patient, consultation, forms, financing

og_meta.title: Get Started | Steel City Orthodontics
og_meta.description: Start your new patient journey with Steel City Orthodontics. Request a complimentary consultation, find forms, and learn what to expect at your first visit.

image.alt: Smiling patients of all ages

paragraphs.text: Advancements in materials and design have made braces sleeker and more comfortable than ever. Steel City Orthodontics will recommend the best brace option after your initial consultation.

image.alt: Two stylish smiling teens taking selfie with braces

paragraphs.text: Invisalign<sup>®</sup> aligners are removable, which helps you maintain excellent oral hygiene during treatment. They let you straighten your smile inconspicuously without the brackets and wires of traditional braces.

image.alt: Close-up of clear aligners being placed on teeth

paragraphs.text: Invisalign<sup>®</sup> Teen fits easily into active lives, giving teens the confidence to smile while letting them remove the aligners for special occasions like dances or photos.

image.alt: Teen patient smiling with braces

paragraphs.text: Surgical orthodontics is used for significant jaw discrepancies and can also play a role in treating obstructive sleep apnea. Our team coordinates closely with surgeons to plan safe, functional outcomes.

image.alt: Orthodontic surgical consultation

paragraphs.text: Around age 7, we evaluate jaw growth and tooth development to catch issues early. Phase 1 treatment can guide growth and often reduces the need for more complex care later.

image.alt: Young patient receiving early orthodontic evaluation

paragraphs.text: Damon™ braces are designed for efficiency and comfort. Without elastic ties, they often allow for longer intervals between appointments while delivering reliable results.

image.alt: Dental checkup with braces

paragraphs.text: Early evaluations let us identify growth trends and intervene when helpful. We offer gentle, age-appropriate care to set children up for healthy development.

image.alt: Smiling family enjoying time together

paragraphs.text: It’s never too late to improve your smile. We offer discreet and efficient options for adults who want to straighten or refine their teeth with minimal disruption to daily life.

image.alt: Modern dental office interior
New patient information at Steel City Orthodontics

paragraphs.text: Find answers to common questions about appointments, locations, treatments, payments, and policies at Steel City Orthodontics.

accordion.header: How do I request an appointment or consultation?

paragraphs.text: You can request a consultation online at https://steelcityorthodontics.com/request-a-consultation/ or call or text your preferred office. The online form asks for patient name, birthdate, contact details, preferred location, and how you found us to help us prepare for your visit.

image.alt: Happy Family Portrait

paragraphs.text: Consultations are complimentary for patients under 18. If you are an adult, please check the request-a-consultation page or call your preferred office for current consultation options.

image.alt: Couple Enjoying Time Together

accordion.header: Where are your offices located and how do I contact them?

paragraphs.text: We serve multiple locations. South Park: 1201 Broughton Rd Ste 102, Pittsburgh, PA 15236, (412) 655-7555. McMurray: 628 E McMurray Rd, McMurray, PA 15317, (724) 941-9600. Washington: 2112 North Franklin Drive, Washington, PA 15301, (724) 222-1063. Charleroi: 17 Arentzen Boulevard Ste 102, Charleroi, PA 15022, (724) 483-4808. Montour Run: Park West One Building, 1000 Cliff Mine Road, Suite 100, Pittsburgh, PA 15275, (412) 264-5755 or (412) 787-1133. Weirton (Dr. John Fishell): 485 Colliers Way Ste E, Weirton, WV 26062, (304) 723-3276.

image.alt: Collaborative Team Spirit Moment

paragraphs.text: We offer traditional braces, Invisalign<sup>®</sup> clear aligners, and surgical orthodontics, along with retainers and follow-up care. Learn more on our treatment pages at https://steelcityorthodontics.com/treatment/, https://steelcityorthodontics.com/braces/, and https://steelcityorthodontics.com/invisalign/.

image.alt: Smiling Man Working at Desk

accordion.header: What payment and insurance options are available?

paragraphs.text: We offer flexible monthly payment plans and accept most major dental insurance carriers. Our team will help you review coverage and set up a financing plan that fits your needs.

image.alt: Mother and Daughter Smiling Together

accordion.header: Where can I find your policies and accessibility information?

paragraphs.text: Our policies and accessibility statement are available online at https://steelcityorthodontics.com/policies-and-accessibility/. This page includes privacy, accessibility, and other practice policies.

image.alt: Happy Family Portrait

accordion.header: How can I follow Steel City Orthodontics on social media?

paragraphs.text: Follow us on Instagram at https://www.instagram.com/steelcityortho/ and on Facebook at https://business.facebook.com/Steel-City-Orthodontics-309394369777964/ for practice news, photos, and updates.
